news.title: Obamacare subsidies extension to get vote after 4 Republicans buck leadership
news.description: Millions of Americans will face much higher health insurance premiums in 2026 if Congress does not extend boosted subsidies for Obamacare plans.

news.title: FCC chief Brendan Carr tells Senate that his agency is 'not formally ... independent'
news.description: FCC chairman Brendan Carr testified to a congressional committee for the first time since ABC suspended Jimmy Kimmel's show following a Carr threat.

news.title: Oracle stock dips 5% on report Blue Owl Capital won't back $10 billion data center
news.description: The cloud company later said the project was moving forward and "on schedule," but that Blue Owl was not part of equity talks.

news.title: Stocks fall as tech rout deepens on Oracle concerns: Live updates
news.description: The S&P 500 and the Dow Industrials each booked a third consecutive losing session on Tuesday.

news.title: FBI Deputy Director Dan Bongino plans to step down early next year, MS NOW reports
news.description: Bongino had been selected by President Donald Trump for the high-profile law enforcement job despite him having no prior FBI experience.

news.title: This communication services ETF could be on the verge of a breakout, charts show
news.description: A bullish chart pattern has been forming for the State Street Communication Services Select Sector SPDR ETF (XLC).

news.title: Defense stocks rally as Germany set to approve $60 billion defense splurge
news.description: German lawmakers are expected to approve proposals for major security procurement.

news.title: Three holds and a cut? Europe's central banks are about to make their final calls of 2025
news.description: The European Central Bank, Bank of England, Riksbank and Norges Bank all meet on Thursday.

news.title: ‘Orwellian’: Ben & Jerry’s founder tells CNBC he’s alarmed by Magnum’s board overhaul
news.description: The world's largest standalone ice cream business, Magnum, is only a week old but has already had a lifetime of corporate drama.

news.title: The chart that has Michael Burry worried about the stock market
news.description: "The Big Short" investor pointed to a graphic showing that U.S. households now hold a larger share of their net worth in equities than in real estate.

news.title: Amazon says AI chief Rohit Prasad is leaving, Peter DeSantis to lead 'AGI' group
news.description: Rohit Prasad, a top Amazon executive overseeing its artificial general intelligence unit, is leaving at the end of this year, the company confirmed.

news.title: Medical supply firm Medline jumps more than 25% in debut after biggest IPO of 2025
news.description: Medline priced at $29 per share on Tuesday, raising $6.26 billion to cap off a strong year for new listings and bolster optimism about 2026.

news.title: Trump vowed to block tankers carrying Venezuela's oil — nearly a dozen are at sea right now
news.description: One of the tankers, Skipper, was seized by American forces in the Caribbean last week in a sharp escalation by the Trump administration.

news.title: Watch Fed Governor Christopher Waller speak on interest rates and the race to succeed Powell
news.description: Waller is one of the five finalists considered for to replace Fed Chairman Jerome Powell when his term expires in May.

news.title: Hassett says Fed independence is ‘really important’ and chair candidates shouldn’t be disqualified for being Trump’s friend
news.description: Hassett declined in a CNBC interview to directly address his own candidacy but said forging consensus is an important part of the job.

news.title: Payrolls rose by 64,000 in November after falling by 105,000 in October, delayed jobs numbers show
news.description: Nonfarm payrolls were expected to increase by 45,000 in November as the unemployment rate rose to 4.5%.

news.title: China lowers anti-dumping tariffs on European pork exporters
news.description: China on Tuesday announced lower duties on pork imports and pig by-products from the European Union.

news.title: 'Appetizer economy': Food inflation is on restaurant table as diners go smaller with menu choices
news.description: Spending on restaurant appetizers is booming during this period of food inflation as consumers find creative ways to cut back even as they continue to dine out.

news.title: The case for more Fed rate cuts could rest on a 'systematic overcount' of jobs numbers
news.description: There are indications that policymakers will be more inclined to cut further if the labor market stays weak.

news.title: Unemployment rate rises, Tesla's 2025 turnaround, Siri's AI upgrade and more in Morning Squawk
news.description: Here are five key things investors need to know to start the trading day.

news.title: Apple punted on AI this year. Next year will be critical
news.description: Apple this year delayed its big Siri upgrade to 2026. As the company looks ahead, the pressure is on for the iPhone maker to show investors its AI strategy.

news.title: CNBC Daily Open: Beauty is in the eye of the U.S. jobs report beholder
news.description: Whether you're a bull or a bear, Tuesday's tea leaves will show you what you want to see — but beware confirmation bias.

news.title: OpenAI in talks with Amazon about investment that could exceed $10 billion
news.description: OpenAI is in discussions with Amazon about a potential investment and an agreement to use its artificial intelligence chips, CNBC confirmed.
